label: Multimedia Editing and Design
description: Principles of visual reporting and editing; seeks to instill application-level competency in a wide array of non-linear, non-narrative techniques of journalistic storytelling across various media. 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: JOUR 215.
courseSectionInformation: 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: JOUR 215.
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Journalism or News-Editorial or Agricultural Communications major(s). Restricted to students with Senior or Graduate class standing.
